content.title: Load balancing
content.description: You can choose the necessary number of cores and the amount of RAM, as well as monitor the VM cost.

content.title: Education and science promotion program in the field of computer science
content.description: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure, data storage services, and ML and development tools.
content.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then. Both in total revenue and in terms of its customer base: more than 10 thousand companies now use our services every day.
